meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive George Tsuji Aimee Slater Vito Cortese Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6026.

td.p: George Tsuji, a software engineer from Ottawa, Ontario, Canada
Aimee Slater, a program manager originally from Spokane, Washington
Vito Cortese, a software engineer and Italian translator from Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania (whose 3-day cash winnings total $68,485)

tr.td: WORLD HERSTORY
THE QUOTABLE DE NIRO
(Alex: You have to name the movie.)
THE DREADED COUNTING CATEGORY
(Alex: Each response will be three numbers, in order.)
YOU'RE SUCH AN ANIMAL!
DRINKS ARE ON ME!
WORD PUZZLES

Aimee

td.a: I LEARNED IT IN BALLET CLASS

tr.td: (Kelly: ...from some of the best dancers in the country at the renowned Dance Theatre of Harlem.)

Triple Stumper
')

George

$6,400
VitoWhat is an S.O.S.?
$4,000
GeorgeWhat is S.O.S.
$6,200
SOS')

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
